name.en: Partial Destruction of the Sacred Tower
name.ja: <ruby>聖<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>塔<rt>とう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>半<rt>はん</rt></ruby><ruby>壊<rt>かい</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a non-Maximum Effect Monster(s) face-up, send 1 card from your hand and 1 monster from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Destroy 1 of those Normal or Special Summoned monsters. If it was not destroyed, place it on the bottom of the owner's Deck.
